subject: Re: One more quake voice
author: jennifer
full_text:
Hi Adrea,
have you heard of sleep paralysis? I wonder if sleep paralysis could be caused by leaving astral state too quickly? I had never thought of this as a possible cause but now I wonder.
Jennifer

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Andrea Carr" <ACARR3@...> wrote:
>
> Really I haven't ever woken up while leaving but when coming back and
> woke up in almost a half awake state feeling trapped because I couldn't
> move until I shook it off.
>  
> Well it depends on what you mean about your wife not being gone long
> enough-LOL my hubby can snore really badly and I have had to go in
> another room to sleep. I should have him get that checked though.
>  
>  
> Andrea
>  
> -----Original Message-----
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Sumption Frank
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 2:31 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] One more quake voice
>  
>  I read that in one of my Astral books, but have never tried it.
> Everytime I get close, the process of leaving breaks my awareness, and
> I'm instantly awake. I had started to work on astral projection again
> when the wife was in the hospital, but she wasn't in long enough
> (cold!?). 
>  
>  
>  
>  
>   _____  
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@...m [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Andrea Carr
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 1:00 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] One more quake voice
>  
> I had read something about that recently too. If I did astral travel
> last night I don't remember it & I did only stay asleep for about  an
> hour at a time. But also when I do astral travel it also leaves me more
> tired than when I went to bed.
>  
> Thanks!
> Andrea
>  
> -----Original Message-----
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Sumption Frank
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 1:27 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] One more quake voice
>  
> I thought that was supposed to be good for Astral work, the unsettled
> weather?
>  
>   _____  
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Andrea Carr
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 11:35 AM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] One more quake voice
>  
> I hear it now must have not had enough coffee in me. Didn't sleep last
> night 5 hours worth of off and on t-storms ugh!
>  
> Andrea
>  
> -----Original Message-----
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Sumption Frank
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 12:25 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] One more quake voice
>  
> The word quake is made out of noise.
>
